transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. I can take you to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 The wheels on me go round and round.
🛑 I stop to pick you up.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you push me with your feet. What am I?

hints.text: 🏞️ You can ride me in the park.
🛎️ I might have a bell to ring.
👧 You sit on a seat to ride me.

transport.question: I fly high in the sky and take people to far away places. What am I?
I float on water and can carry many people or things. What am I?
I run on tracks and take many people to different cities. What am I?
I have a siren and flashing lights, and I help people in emergencies. What am I?

hints.text: 👨‍⚕️ I take people to the hospital.

transport.question: I am a car that can take you anywhere but you have to pay me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚖 I have a sign on top.
📍 I can drive to your house.

transport.question: I have a ladder and a hose, and I help put out fires. What am I?
I travel underground and can take you to different parts of a city very quickly. What am I?
I am a fast car that chases bad guys to keep the city safe. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I have a siren and lights.
🚓 I can be black and white or blue.

food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me!

hints.text: 🐒 I'm a favorite snack of some playful animals.
💛 My color is often associated with happiness.

food.question: I am small, round, and red. I grow on a vine and you can pop me in your mouth!

hints.correctText: 🪴 I can grow on vines or bushes.

hints.text: 🤏 I am very small and easy to eat.

food.question: I am crunchy, orange, and good for your eyes. Rabbits love to eat me!

hints.text: 👓 Some people say I help you see better.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me or put me on your cereal.

hints.text: 🥣 I am often poured on cereal or oatmeal.

food.question: I am long and brown and you cook me in the oven to make fries.

hints.text: 🍟 I can be cut into sticks and fried.
🌍 Many countries eat me as a staple food.

food.question: I am made from flour, water and yeast, and you bake me in the oven. You can make sandwiches with me.

hints.text: 🍞 I am a staple food made in bakeries.
🥪 I can be used to make a tasty lunch.
🌾 The main ingredient is a grain.

food.question: I am green, leafy, and you put me in salads. Sometimes I can be bitter.

hints.text: 🥗 I am a common ingredient in healthy meals.
🥬 I can be a base of many different salads

food.question: I am a yellow fruit with a bumpy skin. I am both sweet and sour.

hints.text: 🍹 I am often used to flavor drinks.
💛 My color is often very bright

food.question: I am made of milk, but I am hard. You can grate me and put me on pasta.

hints.text: 🧀 Mice are often seen eating me in cartoons.
🇮🇹 I am popular in Italian cuisine.
🥛 My main ingredient comes from an animal.

food.question: I am a dessert made of frozen milk, cream, sugar, and flavorings. I can be in a cone or a cup.

hints.text: 🍨 I melt quickly on a hot day.
🌈 I can come in many different colors and flavors.
